original_text: Joab said to Abishai, ‘If the Syrian soldiers are too strong for me, you must come to rescue me. But if the Ammonites are too strong for you, I will come to rescue you.
korean_text: 이르되 만일 아람 사람이 나보다 강하면 네가 나를 돕고 만일 암몬 자손이 너보다 강하면 내가 가서 너를 도우리라

sentences.original_text: If the Syrian soldiers are too strong for me
you must come to rescue me
But if the Ammonites are too strong for you
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 암몬 사람들이 너에게 너무 강하면

sentences.original_text: I will come to rescue you
